name: 蔡修毓
objective:
介紹模糊理論及其於方案評選、績效評估等相關研究方法之應用，並延伸簡介部分機器學習方法。內容包括戴爾菲法、集群分析、層級分析法、理想解趨近法、決策實驗室分析法、Q 方法、資料包絡分析、決策樹與隨機森林、倒傳遞類神經網路等。期使學生能對模糊理論的重要觀念及應用技術有更深一層的認識，不僅提昇閱讀相關論文與期刊等文獻之能力，且對研究工作有所助益。
The course introduces fuzzy theory and related applications in program selection, performance evaluation and other related research methods, and introduces some machine learning methods as well. The content includes Delphi method, cluster analysis, AHP, TOPSIS, DEMATEL, Q method, data envelopment analysis, decision tree and random forest, backward transfer neural network, etc. I hope to help students having deeper understandings of the concepts and application techniques of fuzzy theory, and improving not only the ability of reading related papers but also the ability of research.
